meanings.definition: A title for a Hindu religious leader or teacher.
meanings.sent1: The mahants guided the community in spiritual matters.
meanings.sent2: The mahants at the temple are highly respected.
meanings.sent3: The mahants decided to have a dance-off to determine the best leader.
meanings.sent4: The mahants were like beacons of wisdom in the village.
meanings.sent5: The colorful robes of the mahants fluttered in the wind as they chanted.

meanings.sent1: Many mahants gathered for the annual conference.
meanings.sent2: The mahants traveled from afar to attend the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The mahants formed a band and rocked the stage at the festival.
meanings.sent4: The mahants stood together like a forest of ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the mahants echoed through the halls of the ashram.
